A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is great fun.  Mark Hamil does a fantastic job of playing a \"grumpy old Luke Skywalker\"\, and Daisy Ridley again plays a great Rey opposite Luke and Ben/Kylo Ren.  Meanwhile\, there's a very entertaining (and occasionally heartwarming) dirty dozen plotline with Finn (Boyega)\, Rose (newcomer Kelly Marie Tran)\, and Poe (Isaac).\n\nThe best thing about the movie?  It coheres well\, but it has -so- many fake-outs and plot twists that it's very nicely unpredictable.
